Sakura smiles at her opponent before glaring and summoning her giant inner self. [[Inner Sakura]] yells "I'm speaking from the heart!" as she punches her opponent. The screen shatters, revealing it all to have been a genjutsu and Sakura herself punched her opponent. The foe flies off into the distance. Sakura smiles and says "You should be nice to girls."

[[pl:Kirakira Otome Kokoro]]
